response.original_title: Come Dine With Me - Extra Spicy
response.overview: It's Come Dine With Me - Extra Spicy.  The nation's favourite cooking sow is back on DVD and packed with all new highlights that are extra saucy, extra loud and extra shocking! It's weirder, it's funnier and it's loaded with even more never-before-seen material 100% exclusive to DVD and of course it's all narrated by Dave Lamb.  Come Dine With Me - Extra Spicy, a must for all fans of the show.
response.tagline: Extra saucy, extra loud, extra shocking!
response.title: Come Dine With Me - Extra Spicy
